name: Home Inventory Notion Template [Limitless OS]
description: One of the many awesome mini-templates built into Limitless OS. Check out Limitless OS 3.0 in action:What you can do: Create Storage Units in Different Locations Create new Items in Storage Unites Add pictures for both the Items & Storage Units Always know what to find and where and never lose anything Add items to pantries & freezer with an expiry date Databases Inside: Storage Units Home Inventory Do you have questions?Send your feedback or queries to limitless@previewx.com
features: Create Storage Units in Different Locations; Create new Items in Storage Unites; Add pictures for both the Items & Storage Units; Always know what to find and where and never lose anything; Add items to pantries & freezer with an expiry date; Storage Units; Home Inventory
